commands.name: az storage account task-assignment create
commands.summary: Create creates a new storage task assignment sub-resource with the specified parameters. If a storage task assignment is already created and a subsequent create request is issued with different properties, the storage task assignment properties will be updated. If a storage task assignment is already created and a subsequent create or update request is issued with the exact same set of properties, the request will succeed.
commands.syntax:
az storage account task-assignment create --account-name
                                          --description
                                          --enabled {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}
                                          --execution-context
                                          --name
                                          --report
                                          --resource-group
                                          --task-id
                                          [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]

commands.name: az storage account task-assignment delete
commands.summary: Delete the storage task assignment sub-resource.
commands.syntax:
az storage account task-assignment delete [--account-name]
                                          [--ids]
                                          [--name]
                                          [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                          [--resource-group]
                                          [--subscription]
                                          [--yes]

commands.name: az storage account task-assignment list
commands.summary: List all the storage task assignments in an account.

commands.name: az storage account task-assignment list-report
commands.summary: List the report summary of a single storage task assignment's instances.

commands.name: az storage account task-assignment show
commands.summary: Get the storage task assignment properties.

commands.name: az storage account task-assignment update
commands.summary: Update creates a new storage task assignment sub-resource with the specified parameters. If a storage task assignment is already created and a subsequent create request is issued with different properties, the storage task assignment properties will be updated. If a storage task assignment is already created and a subsequent create or update request is issued with the exact same set of properties, the request will succeed.
commands.syntax:
az storage account task-assignment update [--account-name]
                                          [--add]
                                          [--description]
                                          [--enabled {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                          [--execution-context]
                                          [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                          [--ids]
                                          [--name]
                                          [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                          [--remove]
                                          [--report]
                                          [--resource-group]
                                          [--set]
                                          [--subscription]
                                          [--task-id]

commands.name: az storage account task-assignment wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
